metadata.title: CVE-2019-12469 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: MediaWiki through 1.32.1 has Incorrect Access Control. Suppressed usernameor log in Special:EditTags are exposed. Fixed in 1.32.2, 1.31.2, 1.30.2 and1.27.6.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
